short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Implements a client to send the current active listener to the NowPlaying widget

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables the widget to display information about the currently playing song.

Currently Supported Music Streaming Services:
- YouTube
- YouTube Music
- SoundCloud
- Epidemic Sound
- Deezer
- Pretzel
- Tidal WebPlayer
- Apple Music WebPlayer

This extension requires an account on: 
https://nowplaying.site/

A full guide on how to use the extension is available in our Discord: https://discord.gg/HPFnWk48RT
